contexts.context: ...(Paris). Soon, the revision of the <mark>Dreyfus</mark> process will start. The investigation found over 60...
...found over 60 forgeries which were used to find <mark>Dreyfus</mark> guilty. It is certain that Dreyfus will be...
...to find Dreyfus guilty. It is certain that <mark>Dreyfus</mark> will be found completely innocent.
